example: Adding lanes to highways is a common strategy to improve traffic flow during peak hours.
Local governments often construct new roads to accommodate growing suburban populations.
The transportation plan will focus on improvements to existing highways before building new ones.

english: modernize existing train and bus systems
chinese: 现代化现存的火车和公交系统
example: Modernizing existing train and bus systems can significantly enhance public transportation efficiency.

chinese: （在逻辑上）最为合理或最令人信服
example: Upgrading public transit makes the most sense for cities looking to reduce traffic congestion.
Adding lanes to highways can help reduce the congestion problem during morning commutes.

english: motivate more people to take public transit
chinese: 激励更多的人来乘坐公共交通
example: Modernizing bus systems can motivate more people to take public transit instead of driving.

chinese: 需要好多年来完成现代化
example: Large-scale projects to modernize train systems can take years to complete.
Cities that invest in infrastructure often see improvements in transportation within a few years.

english: upgrade roadways to handle more traffic
chinese: 升级道路来应对更多的交通
example: Local governments are upgrading roadways to handle more traffic from suburban developments.
Adding express lanes can make car trips more efficient for long-distance commuters.
Efficient traffic flow helps cars produce fewer emissions by reducing idling time.
Upgraded roadways with clear signage can reduce the risk of accidents significantly.

english: enhance access to jobs, education, and healthcare
chinese: 增加了接触（好的）工作，教育和医疗的机会
example: Improved public transit enhances access to jobs, education, and healthcare for urban residents.

english: accommodate future population and economic growth
chinese: 承载未来的人口和经济增长
example: City planners must design infrastructure to accommodate future population and economic growth.
Efficient transportation systems can boost economic activity by improving logistics and trade.
Upgraded highways can reduce logistics costs for businesses by improving delivery times.

english: provide affordable and accessible transport options
chinese: 提供负担得起的，可获得的交通选择
example: Modernized bus and train systems provide affordable and accessible transport options for all residents.
Accessible public transit can enhance social equity by connecting underserved communities to opportunities.
Reduced traffic congestion often leads to an improvement in overall air quality.
